title: Task 1: Attribute a work of art to a specific culture.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not attribute the work shown to the specific African culture that created it.
Response does accurately attribute the work shown to the specific African culture that created it.

title: Task 2: Justify the attribution by explaining similarities with work by a specific culture from the image set.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use one example of specific visual evidence to justify the attribution by describing relevant similarities between the work shown and other work of the same type by the same African culture.

Response uses one example of specific visual evidence to justify the attribution by describing relevant similarities between the work shown and other work of the same type by the same African culture.

Response uses two examples of specific visual evidence to justify the attribution by describing relevant similarities between the work shown and other work of the same type by the same African culture.

title: Task 3: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation of meaning of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific contextual evidence to accurately explain the function of this type of work.
Response does accurately use specific contextual evidence to explain the function of this type of work.

title: Task 4: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation of meaning of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific contextual evidence to explain how one function of the work influenced either the form or the content of this type of work.
Response does use specific contextual evidence to accurately explain how one function of the work influenced either the form or the content of this type of work.
